Reviews.Title: “Perfect no frills hotel for single traveller, great location & price”
Reviews.Author: UkPrincess13
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel business trip hilton diagonal mar hotel believed expensive main town chose hotel 54 barceloneta due reviews wasnt disappointed travelling cheap hotel close centre ticked boxes location 5 minutes walk beach theres restaurants supermarkets pharmacy street lots restaurants close port olympic 20 minute walk aquarium 10 minute walk las ramblas 2025 minute walk hotel modern basic single clean theres bath shower facility shower quire single major complaint soundproof front hotel aware noisy major clubs nearby theres noise late night except hear guests getting main issue soundproofing ear plugs stayed breakfast contiental buffet breakfast nice cooked breakfast offer lots croissants cakes yoghurts cereal etc choice including rolls pots coffee instead 1 busy waiter time coffee 1 staff breakfast busy friendly hey breakfast hilton previous days complain recommend kettle theres teacoffee facilities available none provided breakfast goodness hotel busy reception staff nice friendly theres seating downstairs free wifi theres free wifi hotel passwords hotel guide fast service overall happy cheap budget frills hotel thats close beach town centre pharmacy restaurants 2 supermarkets close choice single traveller definitely stay hotel
